name: Sarah M.
text: Rrish helped me understand blues improvisation in a way that finally clicked. His teaching style is patient and encouraging, and I went from barely knowing scales to confidently jamming within months.

name: James T.
text: I've been playing for years but was stuck in a rut. Rrish's approach to music theory and improvisation opened up new possibilities I never knew existed. Highly recommend!

name: Maria L.
text: The online lessons work perfectly. Great sound quality and Rrish makes it feel like we're in the same room. My playing has improved dramatically.

name: David K.
text: As someone who started learning music later in life, I was nervous about lessons. Rrish creates such a supportive environment - I actually look forward to practice now!

name: Emma R.
text: The community aspect is amazing. Meeting other students and participating in jam sessions has been incredible for my confidence and growth as a musician.
